::Halucigen::
Halucigen looks around.
"Finally an attack." He transforms to vulture mode and follows Cygnar.

Rudra656@... wrote:

> ::Cygnar::
>     "I see you brought a friend.  No matter.  Apocalypse decided to leave
> without picking you up.  I don't know why.  And since your message was 
> to him
> no one else answered it.  Here's the plan.  You tunnel under the shields of
> the Trainer base.  Most of us go inside and blow the living hell out of 
> them.
> A few will stay outside to bombard the shields while we attack from 
> behind. 
> Simple plan really.  Now come along. We're regrouping at the Syria 
> base."  He
> opens a com to Ramjet.  "Ramjet.  We're staging at the Syria base.  Report
> there ASAP.  Cygnar out."  He takes off for Syria.
> 
> Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
> <http://us.a1.yimg.com/us.yimg.com/i/space.gif>
> www.
